messages.message: I think this may be a bug in our url redirecting system. What I found was that if an url that opens a pdf/image file does not have `content-disposition=raw` at the end, our system will redirect the URL to add `content-disposition=raw`, and the http/https gets messed up (the redirected URL uses http despite the original url using https). I fixed the bug in table refiner by adding `content-disposition=raw` to my `<object>` url to avoid redirecting. This bug doesnâ€™t show up on localhost because localhost uses http
